item.title: My Zsh setting
item.author: Haolin Yang
item.description: Zsh & Bash Since MacOs 10.15(Catalina). The default shell switch from bash to zsh. It is hard to say which one is better however Zsh has been used more widely than bash especially from Linux user. Zsh The Z shell (also known as zsh) is a Unix shell that is built on top of bash (the default shell for macOS (Before MacOs Catalina)) with additional features. It’s recommended to use zsh over bash.
